description: Prime location right in the heart of tha Upper West Side. Two blocks from yhe Riverside Park and three blocks from Central Park. Subway 96th Street Station with the 1, 2 and 3 lines (red) also two blocks away. This is Amazing Studio with a separeted kitchen. Very Bright. Comfortable and Spacious. Ideal for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.
name: Amazing Studio. Enjoy the best UWS.
review: Small but cozy central UWS apt. 2 blocks from 96th St. station for all transport needs. Plenty of food, drink, and night life local. 15 mins from tourist attractions and 20-25 mins from the Village and southern Manhattan.
